title: Neon Rain
synopsis: A young detective, lost in the labyrinthine corridors of a futuristic airport, catches a glimpse of a mysterious woman who seems to know more than she lets on.  Their brief encounter leaves him questioning everything he thought he knew.

shots.prompt: Low-angle, iPhone-style shaky handheld shot.  Rain streaks across the lens, obscuring the view.  A young detective, trench coat slick with rain, exits a taxi at a futuristic airport at night.  The airport terminal is sleek glass and steel, illuminated by a color palette of 50% grey, 30% blue, and 20% neon.  A low-hanging neon sign partially obscures the detective's face, adding to the noir atmosphere.  The detective's expression is unseen, shrouded in shadow and rain.  The camera pans up slowly, revealing the immense scale of the airport, its towering architecture dwarfed only by the stormy sky.  Water droplets cling to the lens, creating a distorted, cinematic effect.  Focus remains on the detective as he moves, highlighting his isolation in the vast, rain-lashed space.  The overall mood is dark, atmospheric, and suspenseful.
